name: Depths Of Giftmaker's
description:
"He ruined my life,and I'll make him pay for it, even if it costs my sanity."

-Explore The Giftmaker's Facility in all its glory.

-Escape, hide, and find a way to survive in this Free-Roam FNAF fangame.

-This Game is currently in development.

Follow for updates!

Note: this game is currently poorly optimized so if you're not sure of your pc specs, play on medium or low.
